Class Project

java.lang.Object
Project.Project
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity
public class Project extends Object implements IEntity
Represents a BTO housing project with various room types, unit counts, pricing, application periods, and assigned officers. Implements IEntity to support CSV serialization and repository operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(String ID, String projectName, String neighbourhood, String type1, int noOfUnitsType1, double sellPriceType1, String type2, int noOfUnitsType2, double getSellPriceType2, LocalDate appDateOpen, LocalDate appDateClose, String managerID, int noOfficersSlots, List<String> officer, boolean visible)
      Constructs a Project with full officer list.
      Parameters:
      ID - project ID
      projectName - project name
      neighbourhood - location of the project
      type1 - first room type
      noOfUnitsType1 - number of units for type1
      sellPriceType1 - price for type1
      type2 - second room type
      noOfUnitsType2 - number of units for type2
      getSellPriceType2 - price for type2
      appDateOpen - application start date
      appDateClose - application end date
      managerID - manager assigned
      noOfficersSlots - maximum officers allowed
      officer - list of officers assigned
      visible - project visibility status
